cleaned_text: Sold out Regular price $15.99 USD Regular priceUnit price per Sale price $15.99 USD About the product - Detox Therapy - 19 ounce bottle. - All-natural, therapeutic bath crystals - perfect for eliminating and remove toxins. - Powerful aromatherapy with natural coloring - enhances relaxation - vitamin infused. - Remedy for aches and pains - reduce tension and stress - enhance self-healing and detoxify. - Skin softening moisturizers - for spas, hot tubs, jacuzzis, and whirlpool bath. - Does not affect the pH or water chemistry - safe for children and pets - will not damage, stain or affect equipment or surface. Care Instructions Care Instructions Store in a cool/dry place. Do not store in direct sun. Close cap tightly when done to retain scent.
